Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Scaraboid
Description: This scaraboid is rather crudely fashioned and bears no inscription, but is covered with a navy blue enamel, a very rare colour.  It was placed along the humerus of an adult skeleton whose funerary equipment was comprised solely of scarabs.
